sourcesContent:
let itemContainer = { height: 45, width: 800, backgroundColor: '#e4f7ff', margin: '5px 0 0 10px', borderRadius: '10px 5px 5px 10px' } let isd = { width: '15%', minWidth: '15%', color: '#e4f7ff', textAlign: 'center', paddingTop: 8, height: 32, fontSize: 18, backgroundColor: '#063b50', borderRadius: '5px 0 0 5px' } let status = { lineHeight: 2.3, width: 100, marginRight: 10, color: 'black', fontSize: 18, textTransform: 'capitalize' } export default function Tickets({data}) { function renderItems() { return Object.keys(data.items).map((item, i) => (
{item} {data.items[item]}
)) } return (
{data.isd}
Date: {data.date}
Subject: {data.subject}
{data.status}
) }
